text: 10.28 Ais 8.12-13, Luk 12.4, Jem 4.12, 1 Pi 3.14 Nɨbi binɨb sɨj tɨmel pakɨpal okok kɨlop nɨŋɨd ma pɨlɨkɨnɨmɨb agak. Kɨli yokɨp mubwak anep paklɨnɨgabal, kawnan ak sek gɨ tɨmel gɨnɨgel tek ma lup agak. Pɨlɨkɨnɨg nɨm, Bɨawl ak ne binɨb kawnan ak sek, mubwak ak sek gɨ tɨmel gɨl, mab ke yɨneb dɨyokɨnɨgab ak nop pɨlɨkɨnɨmɨb agak.
